scripts.prepare-output: mkdir -p data/output && mkdir -p data/output/web && mkdir -p data/output/pdf
scripts.clear-output: npm run clear-web && npm run clear-pdf
scripts.cp-public-to-web-folders: find data/output/web -mindepth 2 -type d | xargs -I {} cp src/public/* {}
scripts.build-web: npm run prepare-output && npm run clear-web && npm run cp-data-to-web && npm run cp-public-to-web-folders
scripts.start: npm run build-web && npm run serve-web
